name: Send a staff notification email for each delivery

options.email_subject__required: Fulfillment {{ fulfillment_event.fulfillment.name | default: "#1234.1" }} has been delivered!
options.email_body__multiline_required:
For more details, see order {{ fulfillment_event.order.name | default: "#1234" }} in Shopify:

https://{{ shop.domain }}/admin/orders/{{ fulfillment_event.order_id }}

Thanks,
Mechanic

docs: Use this task to send a staff email, the moment Shopify registers a successful delivery.
